title: reportFilter
description:
Controls when and how often a tag is reported

NOTE: This cannot be set while in "INVENTORY" mode. Setting the modeSpecificSetting for interval must be used in "INVENTORY" mode.

duration.description:
Duration (in seconds) to wait to report a tag again once it has already been reported
It should be noted that the way the filter works is that as long as the tag is being read by the reader, it will not report unless the time since the previous report of this tag on this antenna meets the type and duration.

type.description: Configures the timeout (in seconds) by antenna or for entire radio
